title: Case Study: HR Transformation
subtitle: How we helped a client achieve success

center.desc: We partnered with a leading organisation to transform their HR processes, resulting in measurable improvements.

cards.title: Leadership Capability Uplift
cards.desc: Enabled a 30% increase in leadership effectiveness through targeted L&D and executive coaching initiatives.

cards.title: Culture & Engagement Design
cards.desc: Elevated employee engagement by 40% through data-led culture assessments and values-based alignment.

cards.title: HR Technology Integration
cards.desc: Reduced manual HR admin by 50% with digital workflows, self-service portals, and payroll system integrations.

cards.title: Inclusive Hiring Strategies
cards.desc: Tripled candidate diversity in hiring pipelines using inclusive job design, outreach, and bias mitigation training.

cards.title: Employee Lifecycle Automation
cards.desc: Cut new hire onboarding time by 60% through automated processes and engaging preboarding experiences.

cards.title: Organizational Agility & Change
cards.desc: Achieved a 95% adoption rate for new processes during a major transformation initiative.
